title: Update Skills page content and labeling

requirements.summary: Convert the Skills & Services content into a Skills-only page with the specified sections and lists.
acceptanceCriteria: The Skills page no longer renders any 'Services Offered' heading, services list, or service descriptions.
Under 'Core Skills', a 'Programming Languages' subsection displays a bullet list with exactly: Java, Python, C, Dart, JavaScript.
A 'Projects Built' section displays the four projects: Mini Amazon (Java), Mini Tally (Java), Mini Calculator (C), Period Tracker (Dart).
An 'Extra Skills' section displays: Poet, Writer.
All user-facing text on this page is in English.

file_operations.description: Remove the Services section entirely and replace existing skills data/rendering with three Skills-focused sections: Core Skills (Programming Languages bullet list: Java, Python, C, Dart, JavaScript), Projects Built (list: Mini Amazon (Java), Mini Tally (Java), Mini Calculator (C), Period Tracker (Dart)), and Extra Skills (list: Poet, Writer). Ensure no services-related headings or descriptions remain and all displayed text is English.

requirements.summary: Rename the page heading and navigation/table-of-contents label from 'Skills & Services' to 'Skills'.
acceptanceCriteria: The page H2 heading displays "Skills" (not "Skills & Services").
The Table of Contents / navigation label for the skills page displays "Skills" (not "Skills & Services").

file_operations.description: Update the page H2 heading text from "Skills & Services" to "Skills" while preserving existing layout/styling conventions.
Update the portfolio page title/label for the skills page from "Skills & Services" to "Skills" so the table of contents/navigation reflects the new label.
